title: Front-End Developer
aboutText: I am a Front-End developer, passionate about transforming ideas into functional and attractive interfaces. I have hands-on experience with personal projects and constantly study modern technologies, focusing on React, JavaScript, HTML, and CSS. I am always eager to learn new tools and apply best UI/UX practices to deliver quality results. I have discipline, curiosity, and willingness to face challenges and grow with the team.
project1Desc: SPA that consumes exchange API, validates inputs, and formats values in real-time.
project2Desc: Educational JavaScript game practicing DOM manipulation, logic, and user events.
project3Desc: Page with responsive layout and dynamic navigation.
project4Desc: Responsive landing page for dog care services with clean design and intuitive navigation.
project5Desc: Themed page about Android, exploring images and content organization.
project6Desc: Interactive music portfolio for promoting beats, with minimalist design and smooth navigation.
curiositiesText: Besides development, I produce music in my free time.
